genericPoint(p1:l1x,l1y,l1z,d1)
genericPoint(p2:l2x,l2y,l2z,d2)
genericPoint(p3:l3x,l3y,l3z,d3)
pdx pdy

pdx1 = pdx * d1
pdy1 = pdy * d1
adx = l1x - pdx1
ady = l1y - pdy1
pdx2 = pdx * d2
pdy2 = pdy * d2
bdx = l2x - pdx2
bdy = l2y - pdy2
pdx3 = pdx * d3
pdy3 = pdy * d3
cdx = l3x - pdx3
cdy = l3y - pdy3

abdeta = adx * bdy
abdetb = bdx * ady
abdet = abdeta - abdetb

bcdeta = bdx * cdy
bcdetb = cdx * bdy
bcdet = bcdeta - bcdetb

cadeta = cdx * ady
cadetb = adx * cdy
cadet = cadeta - cadetb

alifta = adx * adx
aliftb = ady * ady
aliftt = alifta + aliftb
alift2 = aliftt * d2
alift = alift2 * d3

blifta = bdx * bdx
bliftb = bdy * bdy
bliftt = blifta + bliftb
blift = bliftt * d3

clifta = cdx * cdx
cliftb = cdy * cdy
cliftt = clifta + cliftb
clift = cliftt * d2

la = alift * bcdet
lb = blift * cadet
lc = clift * abdet
lab2 = lc + lb
lab = lab2 * d1

L = lab + la
